Name: Keith Beecham
Job/Team Function: Director of Overseas Network, reporting to CEO VisitBritain. Responsible for the network of 35 Overseas offices which together provide support for the National Brands of Britain, England, London, Scotland and Wales.
Parent Department: Department for Culture, Media and Sport

Name: Laurence Bresh
Job/Team Function: Director of Britain Marketing, reporting to CEO VisitBritain. Responsible for leading, directing and managing the Britain Marketing team in delivering and embedding the marketing strategy -working in partnership with Overseas Network, Distribution Services team and Strategic Partners.
Parent Department: Department for Culture, Media and Sport

Name: David Parkhill
Job/Team Function: Director of Business Services, reporting to CEO VisitBritain.Responsible for Technology, Finance, Facility Management, HR and National Tourism Operating Platform departments. Providing a shared service between VisitBritain/VisitEngland.
Parent Department: Department for Culture, Media and Sport

Name: Patricia Yates
Job/Team Function: Director of Strategy & Communications, reporting to CEO VisitBritain. Responsible for reinforcing VisitBritain's position as a national tourism agency and lead body by developing strategy and policy which help to build the value of tourism to Britain and by managing VisitBritain's reputation and communication with stakeholders and the media.
Parent Department: Department for Culture, Media and Sport

Name: Sandie Dawe
Job/Team Function: Chief Executive of VisitBritain, accountable to the Board of VisitBritain. Accounting Officer to the Department of Culture, Media and Sport for VisitBritain and VisitEngland. Responsible for providing vision, leadership and strategic direction to VisitBritain and to key stakeholders and the tourism industry as a whole.
Parent Department: Department for Culture, Media and Sport
